text:
I noticed the search box on the Tomcat FAQ recently.  Great idea!  While adding
 it to the Struts FAQ and User Guide, I discovered that it can be done without
JavaScript by using the 'domains' and 'sitesearch' form elements.   (See:
http://www.google.com/searchcode.html )

This also causes the results page to have radio buttons so the user can choose
to restrict a second search to your site, and eliminates the 'inurl:' and
'site:' showing in the text box.  

I'm attaching a patch with those changes, and a little rearranging to put a
label underneath the text box.
creator: wsmoak@apache.org
